item.title: Need Help Mixing Your Audio?
item.dc:creator: D3monix
item.description:
Hey guys D3monix Here!
Does anyone need help with making their tracks stand out with balancing audio or creating Crystal Clear Sound?
I am now going to work one on one with everyone who wants to improve their mixing and mastering skills. Drop a comment below and have a wonderful day!

Improve your ears and increase those who hear!
